name: Collection Montages Créatifs
description: Styles artistiques combinant plusieurs versions de la même image dans une mise en page graphique

styles.name: Triptyque Artistique
styles.description: Trois versions visuelles du sujet côte à côte : réaliste, abstrait, noir et blanc
styles.prompt: Make this as a triptych featuring the same person in three vertical panels. Each panel shows a different artistic style: one realistic, one abstract with bold colors, and one in black & white grain. Keep lighting consistent across all versions.

styles.name: Modern vs Classique
styles.description: Portrait divisé en deux : moitié réaliste moderne, moitié peinture classique
styles.prompt: Split the image vertically: the left half is modern and photorealistic, while the right half appears hand-painted like a Renaissance portrait. Ensure seamless blending at the center, with different color tones and textures for contrast.

styles.name: Pop Art Quad
styles.description: Quatre versions du portrait en style pop art à la Warhol
styles.prompt: make this Creating a 2x2 grid inspired by Andy Warhol. Repeat in four squares, each one recolored with high-contrast pop art palettes: pink/yellow, blue/orange, green/red, black/white. Use flat, bold tones and minimal shading.

styles.name: Style Miroir Inversé
styles.description: Reflet inversé avec version alternative (grunge, bruitée, colorée)
styles.prompt: Create a mirrored version , where the reflection shows a different version. Top: clean studio photo. Bottom (inverted): grungy distressed style with noise, scratches, and altered colors. Create a visual contrast between clean and chaos.

styles.name: Visage en Puzzle
styles.description: Visage reconstitué avec pièces de puzzle manquantes ou stylisées
styles.prompt: make this as if made of puzzle pieces. Some areas show clean realistic portrait, others missing or replaced with abstract textures like clouds, circuit boards, or floral patterns. Add subtle shadows between pieces.

styles.name: Style Graffiti & Pochoir
styles.description: Superposition de tags, peintures pochoir et visuel urbain brut
styles.prompt: Overlay the image with graffiti textures, stencil-style portraits, and sprayed paint effects. Use high-contrast black and white with splashes of color. Add rough brick or concrete background with street art layering.

styles.name: Démultiplication Dynamique
styles.description: Sujet répété en plusieurs poses avec effet de mouvement stylisé
styles.prompt: make this multiple silhouettes of the same subject in dynamic motion. Apply different visual effects on each ghosted duplicate: blur, glitch, colored shadow, freeze-frame style. Arrange them in an arc or spread across the background.

styles.name: Cadres Découpés Superposés
styles.description: Découpe de papier en couches avec effet de profondeur artistique
styles.prompt: Design a multi-layer cutout collage with different paper textures. Show depth using shadows between cutout shapes. Each layer reveals a version of the portrait: one clean, one painted, one textured.

styles.name: Pop Collage Magazine
styles.description: Découpage style magazine avec typographies, stickers, collages
styles.prompt: make this as a pop magazine collage using torn paper, printed headlines, doodles, and cutout shapes. Layer elements from fashion, music, emojis, and stickers. Play with bright color palettes and asymmetrical layout.

styles.name: Double Interprétation
styles.description: Deux rendus côte à côte : style cyberpunk VS naturel doré
styles.prompt: make this Duplicating the same image side by side. Left side is rendered in cyberpunk neon style, with glowing accents and dark shadows. Right side is warm golden-hour photography, soft and natural. Keep pose identical, background adjusted for harmony.

name: Photographic Effects & Renders
description: Collection of prompts that modify the visual and photographic style of an image

styles.name: Polaroid Snapshot
styles.description: Add a vintage Polaroid frame with retro color tones
styles.prompt: Render this image as a vintage Polaroid photo. Add a white Polaroid-style border, slightly faded retro colors, soft grain, and natural lens blur. Make the lighting look like daylight film exposure with slight warm tones.

styles.name: Studio Lighting
styles.description: Apply dramatic studio lighting with shadows and reflectors
styles.prompt: Apply professional studio lighting with controlled highlights and deep soft shadows. Use a key light from the left and a reflector on the right for soft contrast. Background should be smooth black or grey. Hyper-realistic finish.

styles.name: Cinematic Lighting
styles.description: Add cinematic mood with warm tones and dramatic contrast
styles.prompt: Transform the image with cinematic lighting and mood. Add soft film grain, warm color grading (orange-teal), and dramatic shadows. Simulate depth using shallow focus and a subtle vignette.

styles.name: Lens: Fisheye Distortion
styles.description: Distort image with fisheye lens curvature
styles.prompt: Render the image as seen through a fisheye lens. Apply wide-angle distortion, with strong curvature and center focus exaggeration. Create immersive, dynamic framing with visible edge warp.

styles.name: Backlit Glow Effect
styles.description: Add soft glowing light from behind the subject
styles.prompt: Apply a glowing backlight effect. Light source is behind the subject, creating rim light and soft atmospheric glow. Slight haze or lens flare included for dreamy silhouette style.

styles.name: Overexposed Vintage Flash
styles.description: Overexposed flash look with retro colors
styles.prompt: Add a strong frontal flash with slight overexposure. Flatten shadows and give a raw snapshot aesthetic. Slight motion blur or grain optional. Retro tones and unfiltered vibe.

styles.name: Bokeh Light Overlay
styles.description: Overlay colorful bokeh lights in foreground and background
styles.prompt: Overlay circular bokeh lights in foreground and background. Use soft pinks, blues, and gold tones. Maintain image focus on subject. Create romantic or dreamy atmosphere.

styles.name: Analog Film Look (35mm)
styles.description: Apply classic 35mm film grain and vintage tones
styles.prompt: Transform the image to look like it was shot on Kodak Portra 400 35mm film. Add soft grain, pastel tones, mild contrast, and organic imperfections like light leaks or lens flare.

styles.name: Infrared Vision
styles.description: Simulate infrared photography with surreal colors
styles.prompt: Render this image as if captured with an infrared camera. Vegetation should appear pink or white, sky deep black or turquoise. Create surreal, dreamlike contrast using inverted heat mapping.

styles.name: Holographic Glow Overlay
styles.description: Add futuristic holographic textures and glows
styles.prompt: Overlay holographic textures and glowing color shifts across the image. Use iridescent tones—purple, cyan, and silver—with shimmer effects and light diffraction. Futuristic feel, semi-transparent overlays.

styles.name: Golden Hour Lighting
styles.description: Simulate soft golden hour sunlight and warm haze
styles.prompt: Apply golden hour lighting with soft sun flare, warm golden tones, and long soft shadows. Highlight edges of the subject with glowing ambient backlight and orange-pink color grading.

styles.name: Tilt-Shift Miniature Effect
styles.description: Add tilt-shift blur to simulate miniature look
styles.prompt: Apply a tilt-shift effect to make the scene appear miniature. Add shallow band of focus across center, with extreme blur above and below. Slight color saturation boost enhances toy-like appearance.

styles.name: Light Rays Through Window
styles.description: Add soft volumetric light rays through a window
styles.prompt: Add soft, atmospheric light rays streaming through a window, dust particles suspended in air. Simulate natural ambient lighting with subtle shadows and gentle diffusion. Create a warm, poetic ambiance.

styles.name: Soft Dream Glow
styles.description: Add glowing soft blur and pastel glow tones
styles.prompt: Render this image with a dreamy soft-focus glow. Add pastel pink and blue tones, low contrast, and blooming highlights. Apply a subtle glow to edges and soft vignette for an ethereal mood.

styles.name: Moody Black & White Grain
styles.description: Convert to high-contrast black & white with grain
styles.prompt: Convert the image to high-contrast black and white. Add visible grain texture, strong shadows, and deep blacks. Emphasize emotion through harsh lighting and sharp textures, like classic photojournalism.

styles.name: Neon Glow & Cyberpunk
styles.description: Apply neon lighting and futuristic cyberpunk colors
styles.prompt: Add intense neon lighting and a cyberpunk aesthetic. Use vibrant purple, blue, and magenta tones. Glow effects, reflections, and city light ambiance. Make it feel like a futuristic sci-fi scene at night.

styles.name: Double Exposure Portrait
styles.description: Blend a portrait with natural or urban elements
styles.prompt: Create a double exposure effect. Blend the subject's face or silhouette with forest landscapes, city skylines, or clouds. Keep the portrait crisp with semi-transparent overlaid imagery.

styles.name: Projector Light Mapping
styles.description: Project geometric or artistic patterns onto the subject
styles.prompt: Simulate light projections of patterns onto the face or background. Use grids, text, stripes, or floral textures. The light should wrap around the contours for dramatic effect.

styles.name: Vintage 90s Camcorder Look
styles.description: Add VHS-style blur, timestamp, and analog artifacts
styles.prompt: Render the image as if recorded with a 1990s VHS camcorder. Add timestamp in the corner, slight interlacing, grain, chromatic aberration, and a slight blue-magenta shift. Low contrast and analog blur.

styles.name: Old Newspaper Halftone Print
styles.description: Convert image to black and white halftone print texture
styles.prompt: Convert the image to an old halftone print like a newspaper. Black and white only. Dot-based texture, high contrast edges, slight paper grain, with minor ink misalignment artifacts.

styles.name: Thermal Vision
styles.description: Simulate a heat-detecting thermal camera view
styles.prompt: Render the image as seen through a thermal camera. Use false color scale: blue for cold areas, red and yellow for hot spots. Apply visual noise and low detail, simulating night vision.

styles.name: Oil Painting Texture
styles.description: Transform image with oil paint strokes and canvas texture
styles.prompt: Transform the image into an oil painting. Use visible brush strokes, thick textures, and canvas surface grain. Colors should blend like traditional oils, with soft edges and impasto highlights.

styles.name: Editorial Cutout Collage
styles.description: Apply modern cutout collage style with paper layers
styles.prompt: Create a cutout collage style using paper textures, torn edges, layered shapes, and bold magazine-style compositions. Add shadows between layers to emphasize the 3D effect.

name: Montages Simples & Épurés
description: Dispositions graphiques simples avec plusieurs images encadrées, chacune filtrée par une couleur dominante ou un style minimaliste.

styles.name: Trilogie Horizontale
styles.description: 3 portraits côte à côte, chacun avec un filtre de couleur différent
styles.prompt: make this as a horizontal  . Each version uses a different monochrome filter: red, green, and blue. Keep lighting soft and minimalist.

styles.name: Carré à 4 Couleurs
styles.description: Grille 2x2 avec 4 images dans des teintes pastel variées
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each quadrant is lightly color-tinted: soft pink, mint green, sky blue, and beige. Keep clean white borders and soft contrast.

styles.name: Bande Verticale Minimaliste
styles.description: Trois images en bande verticale avec un effet film doux
styles.prompt: Display a vertical strip of three portraits. Use the same image with subtle filters: one warm tone, one cool tone, one in grayscale. Add thin white gaps between panels for a clean layout.

styles.name: Polaroids Croisés
styles.description: 4 petites images en style polaroid empilées en décalé
styles.prompt: Create four small square versions in polaroid frames, slightly rotated and overlapping. Each one has a vintage film filter: faded red, yellow hue, grainy black and white, and teal shift.

styles.name: Color Fade Panel
styles.description: Transition visuelle sur 4 images d’un filtre chaud vers un filtre froid
styles.prompt: Display a sequence of four images from left to right. Each uses a progressive color filter: warm orange, pink, purple, then cool blue. Keep the same pose throughout for visual consistency.

styles.name: Bandes Décalées
styles.description: Trois encarts légèrement décalés, comme des diapositives en mouvement
styles.prompt: Show three versions of the image, each shifted diagonally like sliding panels. Each panel uses a muted color overlay: beige, dusty rose, and soft grey. Add subtle shadows behind panels.

styles.name: Filtres Film Vintage
styles.description: Grille avec filtres photo rétro : sépia, grain, délavé
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each quadrant uses a different vintage film filter: faded sepia, dusty black & white, washed-out color, and grainy analog tone. Maintain a neutral frame and soft vignette.

styles.name: Teintes Sombres Équilibrées
styles.description: Teintes sourdes et désaturées avec ambiance élégante
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Use a muted color theme: dusty plum, forest green, navy blue, and taupe. Maintain clean white spacing, with soft shadows and a calm editorial tone.

styles.name: Futurisme Digital
styles.description: Grille stylisée futuriste avec effets glitch et accents cybernétiques
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each square features subtle digital glitch effects and cyberpunk tints: neon magenta, acid green, cyan glow, and holographic silver. Keep the layout clean with sharp separation between quadrants.

styles.name: Noir et Blanc Varié
styles.description: Variation de styles noir et blanc dans chaque encart
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. All quadrants are black and white but use different treatments: high contrast, soft grainy, matte finish, and harsh film noir shadows. Keep spacing crisp and square.

styles.name: Palette Chromatique Dégradée
styles.description: Dégradé subtil à travers les 4 images dans des tons complémentaires
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each quadrant shifts hue slightly to form a visual gradient: lavender to blue, blue to green, green to yellow, yellow to coral. Keep contrast low and borders soft white.

styles.name: Villes du Monde
styles.description: Grille avec arrière-plans de grandes villes : Paris, Tokyo, New York, Rio
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each version features a famous city in the background: Eiffel Tower in Paris, neon Tokyo street, New York skyline, and Rio's beach with Christ the Redeemer. Use soft lighting and thin white frames.

styles.name: Saisons en Décor
styles.description: Même sujet dans des décors saisonniers différents
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same portrait in a 2x2 grid. Each version has a seasonal background: snowy park for winter, blooming garden for spring, beach for summer, and falling leaves for autumn. Maintain consistent subject position.

styles.name: Monuments Célèbres
styles.description: Portrait devant quatre monuments iconiques
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each has a different world monument as background: Pyramids of Giza, Colosseum in Rome, Taj Mahal, and Sydney Opera House. Align subject consistently, blend lighting naturally.

styles.name: Ambiances Célestes
styles.description: Chaque fond représente un ciel différent : nuit étoilée, lever de soleil, ciel orageux, ciel rose
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each has a unique sky backdrop: starry night, golden sunrise, dramatic storm clouds, and pink sunset. Maintain clean framing and balance subject lighting to match.

styles.name: Fonds Artistiques
styles.description: Chaque carré montre un fond graphique ou peint
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each frame has a stylized artistic background: watercolor wash, graffiti wall, geometric abstract pattern, and oil paint texture. Keep the subject natural with light color correction.

styles.name: Univers de Contes
styles.description: Quatre mondes de contes de fées différents : forêt magique, château, village médiéval, grotte enchantée
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each quadrant places the subject in a fairytale world: enchanted forest, stone castle, medieval village, and glowing crystal cave. Lighting should match each scene’s mood.

styles.name: Paysages de Science-Fiction
styles.description: Fonds imaginaires futuristes : planète rouge, ville volante, base lunaire, jungle alien
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each version is placed in a sci-fi environment: red planet, flying city, moon base, and alien jungle. Match subject lighting to ambient tones.

styles.name: Textures Murales
styles.description: Chaque fond est une texture murale différente : béton, brique, graffiti, tôle rouillée
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each quadrant has a different textured wall behind: cracked concrete, red brick, graffiti mural, and rusted metal. Keep subject centered and clean.

styles.name: Fonds Monochromes Profonds
styles.description: Fonds unis mais très saturés : bordeaux, bleu nuit, vert émeraude, orange foncé
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each background is a solid, deep saturated color: burgundy, navy blue, emerald green, and burnt orange. Subject remains neutral and centered, with crisp lighting.

styles.name: Bois & Matériaux Naturels
styles.description: Fonds en bois et matières naturelles
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each quadrant has a different textured wall behind: polished wood, bark texture, woven straw, and stone bricks. Keep subject centered and clean.

styles.name: Textures Tissus
styles.description: Fonds doux inspirés de tissus textiles
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each quadrant has a different textured wall behind: linen, velvet, corduroy, and silk drapery. Keep subject centered and clean.

styles.name: Ambiances Architecturales
styles.description: Fonds inspirés de structures architecturales
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each quadrant has a different textured wall behind: glass facade, wooden slats, mosaic tile wall, and concrete arch. Keep subject centered and clean.

styles.name: Graphismes Modernes
styles.description: Fonds géométriques et lignes modernes
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each quadrant has a different textured wall behind: black-and-white chevron pattern, red diagonal stripes, grey geometric cubes, and soft color gradients. Keep subject centered and clean.

styles.name: Ambiances Urbaines
styles.description: Fonds de ruelles ou de ville
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each quadrant has a different textured wall behind: tiled metro wall, subway map poster, painted alley wall, and stained concrete. Keep subject centered and clean.

styles.name: Papier & Supports Créatifs
styles.description: Fonds en papier plié ou froissé
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each quadrant has a different textured wall behind: wrinkled notebook paper, folded kraft, glossy magazine page, and torn newsprint. Keep subject centered and clean.

styles.name: Ambiances Typographiques
styles.description: Fonds avec typographies et lettrages artistiques
styles.prompt: Arrange four versions of the same image in a 2x2 grid. Each quadrant has a different textured wall behind: chalkboard writing, graffiti tags, vintage sign lettering, and handwritten quotes. Keep subject centered and clean.

name: Collection Grands Peintres
description: Styles inspirés des plus grands maîtres de la peinture

styles.name: Van Gogh
styles.description: Style expressionniste avec coups de pinceau tourbillonnants
styles.prompt: Make this into a painting in the style of Vincent van Gogh, with swirling brushstrokes, bold outlines, and emotional colors.

styles.name: Pablo Picasso
styles.description: Interprétation cubiste avec fragmentation géométrique
styles.prompt: Make this into a cubist interpretation inspired by Pablo Picasso, with geometric fragmentation and multiple perspectives.

styles.name: Salvador Dalí
styles.description: Scène surréaliste avec formes fondantes et logique onirique
styles.prompt: Make this into a surreal scene in the style of Salvador Dalí, with melting forms, dream logic, and eerie shadows.

styles.name: Claude Monet
styles.description: Style impressionniste avec touche légère et atmosphère naturelle
styles.prompt: Make this into an impressionist canvas inspired by Claude Monet, with soft dabs of light, flowing color, and natural atmosphere.

styles.name: Henri Matisse
styles.description: Pièce fauviste vibrante avec couleurs non-naturalistes
styles.prompt: Make this into a vibrant fauvist piece like Henri Matisse, using wild, non-naturalistic colors and expressive forms.

styles.name: Johannes Vermeer
styles.description: Scène réaliste et poétique avec éclairage délicat
styles.prompt: Make this into a realistic yet poetic scene in the style of Johannes Vermeer, with delicate lighting and intimate interiors.

styles.name: Caravaggio
styles.description: Composition sombre et dramatique avec clair-obscur intense
styles.prompt: Make this into a dark and dramatic composition inspired by Caravaggio, with intense chiaroscuro and emotional realism.

styles.name: Leonardo da Vinci
styles.description: Pièce Renaissance détaillée avec anatomie parfaite
styles.prompt: Make this into a detailed Renaissance piece in the style of Leonardo da Vinci, with perfect anatomy and subtle sfumato.

styles.name: Gustav Klimt
styles.description: Peinture symboliste avec textures dorées et motifs décoratifs
styles.prompt: Make this into a symbolist painting like Gustav Klimt, with golden textures, decorative patterns, and mystical energy.

styles.name: Jacques-Louis David
styles.description: Pièce dynamique avec héroïsme néoclassique
styles.prompt: Make this into a dynamic action-filled piece like Jacques-Louis David, with neoclassical heroism and sharp realism.

styles.name: Jackson Pollock
styles.description: Toile expressionniste abstraite avec éclaboussures énergiques
styles.prompt: Make this into an abstract expressionist canvas in the style of Jackson Pollock, with energetic splatters and chaotic rhythm.

styles.name: Edvard Munch
styles.description: Scène existentielle avec formes distordues et couleurs angoissées
styles.prompt: Make this into a moody, existential scene in the style of Edvard Munch, with distorted forms and anxious color palettes.

styles.name: Henri Rousseau
styles.description: Composition audacieuse et simplifiée avec perspective naïve
styles.prompt: Make this into a bold and simplified composition like Henri Rousseau, with naïve perspective and jungle fantasy.

styles.name: Paul Gauguin
styles.description: Pièce post-impressionniste vive avec aplats de couleur
styles.prompt: Make this into a vivid post-impressionist piece in the style of Paul Gauguin, with flat fields of color and exotic themes.

styles.name: Giorgio de Chirico
styles.description: Rêve mécanique surréaliste avec ombres métaphysiques
styles.prompt: Make this into a precise surreal mechanical dream like Giorgio de Chirico, with metaphysical shadows and timeless architecture.

styles.name: Mark Rothko
styles.description: Peinture minimaliste avec grands dégradés et tons émotionnels
styles.prompt: Make this into a minimalist color field painting like Mark Rothko, with large gradients and deep emotional tones.

styles.name: Marc Chagall
styles.description: Vision onirique colorée avec figures flottantes et symboles folkloriques
styles.prompt: Make this into a dreamlike pastel-colored vision like Marc Chagall, with floating figures and folkloric symbols.

styles.name: Peter Paul Rubens
styles.description: Composition baroque avec grand mouvement et formes musclées
styles.prompt: Make this into a baroque composition in the style of Peter Paul Rubens, with grand movement, muscular forms, and ornate beauty.

styles.name: Roy Lichtenstein
styles.description: Composition pop art avec points de style bande dessinée
styles.prompt: Make this into a bold pop art composition inspired by Roy Lichtenstein, with comic-style dots, bright colors, and graphic drama.
